name: BUS IN A DESERT
description:
A simple game where you have to avoid obstacles while driving a desert bus, while maintaining balance of said bus. You could last a short time or last forever.

Controls are simple, you press left to go left, right to go right. This can be with the mouse (left and right mouse buttons), keyboard (left and right directional keys) or XInput gamepad (left and right shoulder buttons).
